courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: THEA 222.
description: Historical and comparative survey of designs, motifs, and forms of decor in the West. Emphasis on the relation between research and design for the stage. Enrollment limited to Theatre majors. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: THEA 222.
label: History of Decor
